custom-action.name: topic_-_publish
custom-action.description:
Publishes a message to a given topic.
Possible parameters are: - topic (required): The JNDI topic name. - messageType (required): Text or Bytes. Default value is "Text". - textContent (optional): The message content. - contentFile.path (optional): The path of the content file. Use the variable '${NL-CustomResources}' to access on the Load Generator the synchronized resources located in the 'custom-resources' folder of the project. - contentFile.charset (optional): The charset of the file. - contentFile.parse (optional): Whether or not to parse the file to replace variables. Default value is "false". - expiration (optional): The expiration time (in ms) before the message becomes obsolete. When set to default value (0) the message does not expire. Default value is "0". - priority (optional): The priority of the message. Default value is "4". - persistentDeliveryMode (optional): Whether or not to set DeliveryMode.NON_PERSISTENT. Default value is "true". - properties (optional): You can setup the name, the value and the class (type) of value. Default type is String. The value must follow the pattern name=[class]value separated by '\n'. Example : size=[java.lang.Integer]150. One line per property.
